Objective

Nova is a concept for a space and science themed video on demand service. This project began by defining the brand and establishing the look and feel.

Low Fidelity

A simple flow was then created, in which the majority of the interactions would occur on the lander/home screen and the extra information screen. Additionally a wireframe for the video player was designed.

High fidelity

From this stage a visual design was created based on established brand guidelines. Simple clean iconography was implemented and placeholder photography was sourced from NASA’s creative commons.

Concept Demo

A short demo was then created to illustrate the key functionality of the application. In addition to establishing the look and feel of this product, further establishing the brand.
